Title.text: Air Quality Management Open Burning Application

Text.text: Search by ERF number and Allotment:

core:Title.text: Provide alternate contact details if available:

Label.text: Provide the meterage of biomass being burned (m² for area burns, m3 for stack burns) )
Estimated cost of the open burning operation (ZAR) (only numeric)
Time period of burn in days (day or part thereof)
Detail every alternative investigation, including cost for the disposal of material to be open burned.
Is the proposed burn site at least 100m away from any building or structures?
Specify the water source to be utilised for firefighting.
Is the land on which the proposed burning of combustible material will take place, state land, a farm, small holding or land within a proclaimed township not used for residential purposes?.
Describe the firefighting and/or resource measures that will be put in place during the proposed open burn.
Is the area adjacent to the proposed combustible material free of material which is likely to spread the fire?
For stack/fuel reduction burning, are stacks of such a size that should a sudden wind arise the fire can be easily doused using equipment on site?

ComboBox.valueStateText: Error message. All the files with [ * ] are mandatory
